participant_1.background:
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I like to organize my home and surroundings to keep busy on the weekends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I am not rich, but I am working hard to achieve my financial goals.

participant_2.background:
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Hello! I am going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.  How are you?
Good, thank you! I am going to go to the gym and then work on some organizing at home.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! I love working out but it is hard to find the time to do it, especially with my night shift schedule.
I know what you mean! I try to go to the gym at least three times a week, but it can be tough to get motivated.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read and cook too. What is your favorite book?
I have so many favorites! I love to read all different types of books, but I really enjoy historical fiction and mysteries.
I love historical fiction too! I just finished reading a book about the American Revolution and I really enjoyed it.
That sounds like a great book! I will have to check it out.
You should! It is really good. So, what do you like to cook?
I love to cook all different types of food, but I am especially good at making pasta dishes and desserts.
Those are my two favorite foods! I love pasta and dessert!
Me too! I think we would get along great!
